dict.string: You need to write two loops. Make the first—the [outer loop](glossary://outer%20loop)—run while your character is not blocked. Make the second—the [inner loop](glossary://inner%20loop)—move your character forward while not on a gem. The outer loop will continue to run the inner loop until the outer loop stops. In this way, the inner `while` loop runs continuously until the end condition is met.
